masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "I'm calling about... a research subject. Designation 1A. It's a mutant tardigrade, highly resilient. It was spotted near GenTech Labsâ€”the facility where it was created. I need it recovered. Discretely. It knows things."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Find out what Puddles is looking for at the lab
  • Decide: help Puddles or return him to Dr. Cross?
  • What secrets is GenTech hiding?
